name: zipline
description: Zipline is a self-hosted file sharing and paste service with short URLs, drag-and-drop uploads, and image support. It features authentication, statistics, and extensibility through a polished web UI.
features: File uploads: Share files quickly with drag-and-drop uploads or paste images directly from clipboard.
Short URLs: Generate memorable short links for uploaded files to simplify sharing and tracking.
Image hosting: Upload and share images with direct links suitable for embedding in forums and websites.
Paste service: Create text pastes with syntax highlighting for code snippets and formatted content.
User authentication: Secure your instance with user accounts and API keys for controlled access.
Upload statistics: Track views, downloads, and bandwidth usage for each uploaded file with detailed analytics.
Custom domains: Configure custom domains for short URLs to match your branding preferences.
File management: Organize, rename, and delete uploaded files through a clean web dashboard.
Expiration settings: Set automatic deletion times for uploads to manage storage and maintain privacy.
ShareX integration: Connect with ShareX and other screenshot tools for instant uploads with custom configurations.
Embed support: Generate embed codes for images and files to display content on external websites.
API access: Upload and manage files programmatically using REST API endpoints for automation workflows.
